name: Cavern 10
description:
Cavern 10 is a simplified re-interpretation of Caverns of Mars, created for the "NOMAM Basic Ten-Liners 2014" competition. The entire code, written in the Turbo Basic XL language, is 10 lines long.

The entire game takes 100 seconds to complete, and consists entirely of moving your ship left and right, steering it past obstacles and outcroppings in the rocky tunnel so that it reaches the end goal safely. Any collision causes a game over and forces the player to start over.

shot.caption: Beginning of the cavern. All the items keep flashing white and orange.
Next section: avoid the missiles and ships
